bibl.title: The Soter Tomb in Thebes.
bibl.note: Indirect arguments speak seriously for a provenance of the Soter find (second cent. A.D.) from TT [Theban Tomb] 32 (Tomb of Djehutimes from the time of Ramesses II, excavated since 1983 by the Hungarian Mission of the Eötvös University).

bibl.title: Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period

bibl.seg: KÁKOSY László, The Soter Tomb in Thebes.

S.P. VLEEMING (Ed.), Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVII (Leiden, 1995) pp. 61-67, 3 figg. et pll. I-II.

Indirect arguments speak seriously for a provenance of the Soter find (second cent. A.D.) from TT [Theban Tomb] 32 (Tomb of Djehutimes from the time of Ramesses II, excavated since 1983 by the Hungarian Mission of the Eötvös University).
